_field_real.name: minimum spawn time:seconds#Absolute floor. Used to put a few-frame delay between death and instaspawn. Will not override longer minimum times.
min acceptable spawn score#spawns with a score lower than this will never be used

plugin._field_explanation: Values that affect randomization of respawn point selection Runtime will use the largest of '% best weight to use' and 'Min absolute weight range'

_field_real.name: maximum random spawn bias:0 disables#Controls how large of a random value gets added to each spawn point

_field_real_fraction.name: % num spawn points to use:0 uses only best point#Example - On a map with 140 respawn points, a value of 0.1 here will choose randomly between up to the best 14 points. Number of points considered is also limited by the following parameters and flags. If next two parameters are 0, only points with the exact same weight as the highest scoring respawn point will be considered. If 'Min absolute weight range' is 25 then the best 'X' points within 25 points of the highest scoring point will be considered.

% best weight to use:0 disables#Example - Value of 0.25 will consider all points with weight within 25% of the highest scoring point. Note - At run-time, the larger of '% best weight to use' and 'Min absolute weight range' will be used. For instance if '% best weight' is 0.1 and 'Min absolute weight' is 5.0' a max weight of 150 will use 15, but a max weight of 10 will fall back on the min weight of 5

_field_real.name: Min absolute weight range:0 disables#Example - Value of 50 will consider all points within 50 of the highest scoring point. Note - At run-time, the larger of '% best weight to use' and 'Min absolute weight range' will be used.

item.Name: Allow negative weights in randomization#If checked, negative weighted respawn points are treated the same as ones with positive weight. If not checked, negative respawn points aren't grouped with positive weighted respawn points.

plugin._field_explanation: block index 0: influencer - Enemy Forbid block index 1: influencer - Enemy Bias block index 2: influencer - Ally Bias block index 3: influencer - Selected Ally Bias block index 4: influencer - Dead Teammate block index 5: influencer - Respawn Zone block index 6: influencer - Weapon block index 7: influencer - Vehicle block index 8: influencer - Projectile block index 9: influencer - Equipment block index 10: influencer - Fireteam 1 zone block index 11: influencer - Fireteam 2 zone block index 12: influencer - Fireteam 3 zone block index 13: influencer - Fireteam 4 zone block index 14: influencer - Drop Pod block index 15: influencer - Auto Turret

item.Name: Pin influence to Minimum and Maximum

_field_real.name: Minimum Influence:Only used if 'Pin' flag is set
Maximum Influence:Only used if 'Pin' flag is set

plugin._field_explanation: This is a tight cylinder around the player with a strong negative weight. It serves to protect players from spawning close to an enemy, or having and enemy spawn close to them.

_field_block.name: ef falloff function#Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin._field_explanation: This is a larger cylinder, with a size set specifically for the size of the map. It has a weak negative weight which falls to zero towards the outer radius. It serves to bias players away from spawning near enemies, or in enemy held areas.

_field_block.name: eb falloff function#Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin._field_explanation: This is a larger cylinder, with a size set specifically for the size of the map. It has a weak positive weight which falls to zero towards the outer radius. It serves to bias players towards spawning with allies, or in areas which are controlled by friendly players.

_field_block.name: ab falloff function#Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin._field_explanation: Same as ALLY BIAS, but used when the ally is selected in the dead-camera.

_field_block.name: sab falloff function#Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin._field_explanation: Dead teammate influences are cylinders centered upon the body of a dead teammate (or the playerÂ’s own dead body).

_field_block.name: dt falloff function#Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin._field_explanation: Drop pods influences are cylinders centered on unclaimed ordnance.

_field_block.name: Drop Pod falloff function#Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin._field_explanation: Auto Turret influences are cylinders centered on players' auto turrets.

_field_block.name: Auto Turret falloff function#Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin._field_explanation: These influencers are induced by weapons either weilded or carried in the player's backpack
These influencers are induced by vehicles.

_field_real.name: box min height:wu#How far influencer will extend below unit's origin. Will usually be negative. (If min and max are both 0, unit radius is used)
box max height:wu#How far influencer will extend above unit's origin. Will usually be positive. (If min and max are both 0, unit radius is used)

plugin._field_explanation: These influencers are induced by projectiles.
These influencers are induced by equipment.
